de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.datageneration.unit
Class Time

java.lang.Object
  de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.datageneration.unit.Time
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableUnit, WeightAndMeasurement
public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightAndMeasurement

A class to represent units in time. It's derived from weight and measurements and possible measures are:

  • sec
  • min
  • h

Since:
Apr/20/09
Version:
0.1
Author:
Michael Munz

notifyObserverUnit

public void notifyObserverUnit()
Description copied from interface: ObservableUnit
Here's the fun part; this is where we tell all observers about the state. Because they are all Observers, we know they all implement update(), so we know how to notify them.

Specified by:
notifyObserverUnit in interface ObservableUnit

registerObserverUnit

public void registerObserverUnit(ObserverUnit observer,
                                 java.lang.String name)
Description copied from interface: ObservableUnit
When an observer registers, we just add it to the end of an observer list.

Specified by:
registerObserverUnit in interface ObservableUnit
Parameters:

removeObserverUnit

public void removeObserverUnit(ObserverUnit observer,
                               java.lang.String name)
Description copied from interface: ObservableUnit
Likewise, when an observer wants to un-register, we just take it off the list.

Specified by:
removeObserverUnit in interface ObservableUnit
Parameters:
observer - an object which doesn't want any notifications anymore.
name - the name of an unit to remove observer.
